type.name: org.gradle.api.publish.maven.MavenArtifact
type.description: An artifact published as part of a MavenPublication.

method.name: builtBy
method.description:
Registers some tasks which build this artifact.
param:tasks The tasks. These are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Task#dependsOn(Object...).

method.name: getClassifier
method.description: The classifier used to publish the artifact file. A null value (the default) indicates that this artifact will be published without a classifier.

method.name: getExtension
method.description: The extension used to publish the artifact file, never null. For an artifact without an extension, this value will be an empty String.

method.name: getFile
method.description: The actual file contents to publish.

method.name: setClassifier
method.description:
Sets the classifier used to publish the artifact file.
param:classifier The classifier.

method.name: setExtension
method.description:
Sets the extension used to publish the artifact file.
param:extension The extension.

property.name: classifier
property.description: The classifier used to publish the artifact file. A null value (the default) indicates that this artifact will be published without a classifier.

property.name: extension
property.description: The extension used to publish the artifact file, never null. For an artifact without an extension, this value will be an empty String.

property.name: file
property.description: The actual file contents to publish.
